web_snippets: Ajani Burrell is an assistant professor at the Northern Marianas College, where he also chairs the Languages and Humanities Department and the Academic Council.
Northern Marianas College professor Ajani Burrell was featured on the All Across America podcast with host Marco Vigliotti.
